bay-87-road.desc: West road -- approach to Docking Bay 87 area

road-center.desc: Road, center section (between the two bays)

road-west.desc: Road, west section (near large docking bay)

road-south.desc: Southern road below large docking bay

road-north.desc: Northern road above buildings between bays

bay-large-entrance.desc: Large docking bay entrance (left-center bay, main access road)

bay-large-rim-north.desc: Large docking bay north rim -- open edge, overlooks bay floor

bay-large-rim-south.desc: Large docking bay south rim -- edge overlooking bay

bay-large-rim-west.desc: Large docking bay west rim -- nearest buildings

bay-large-rim-east.desc: Large docking bay east rim -- road side

bay-large-floor-center.desc: Large docking bay floor center (cross-hair pattern, open area -- no cover)

bay-large-floor-north.desc: Large docking bay floor north side (near fuel lines)

bay-large-floor-south.desc: Large docking bay floor south side (cargo area)

bay-small-entrance.desc: Small docking bay entrance (upper-right bay, main access)

bay-small-rim-north.desc: Small docking bay north rim -- edge

bay-small-rim-south.desc: Small docking bay south rim -- near road

bay-small-rim-west.desc: Small docking bay west rim -- buildings side

bay-small-rim-east.desc: Small docking bay east rim -- outer edge

bay-small-floor-center.desc: Small docking bay floor center (cross-hair pattern, open -- no cover)

checkpoint-approach.desc: Approaching checkpoint from east (visible to guards)

checkpoint.desc: Checkpoint building (2-4 troopers or guards, scanner equipment)

checkpoint-barricade.desc: Behind the barricades at checkpoint (+2D cover)

checkpoint-past.desc: Past the checkpoint (cleared, heading to bay entrance)

buildings-between-bays.desc: Street between the two docking bays

buildings-east-street.desc: Street in east building block (beyond small bay)

buildings-south-street.desc: Street in south building cluster (below large bay)

garrison-front.desc: Street in front of garrison annex (between bays)

garrison-annex.desc: Garrison annex (off-duty troopers, armory in back room)

guard-station.desc: Guard station (shift changeover every 2 hours, brief gap in coverage)

guard-station-front.desc: Street in front of guard station

detention.desc: Detention block (cells, Difficult Security 25 to unlock)

detention-front.desc: Street in front of detention block

impound-lot.desc: Impound lot (seized civilian vehicles, Moderate Mechanical to hotwire one)

impound-lot-front.desc: Street south of small bay near impound lot

supply-depot.desc: Supply depot (Imperial gear, E-11 blasters 800 credits on black market)

supply-depot-front.desc: Street in front of supply depot

patrol-route-bay.desc: Patrol route near large bay east rim (stormtroopers every 5 min)

patrol-route-between.desc: Patrol route on northern road between bays

imp-speeder.desc: Parked Imperial speeder (Very Difficult Mechanical 25, fast but conspicuous)

vaporator-bay.desc: Behind vaporator near large bay east side (partial cover)

cover-fuel-drums.desc: Behind fuel drums near large bay entrance (+1D cover, explosive hazard)

cover-cargo-crates.desc: Behind cargo crates between bays (+1D cover)

obstacles.desc: North-west building block (buildings north-west of large bay)
West building block (south-west of large bay)
Building cluster north of gap between bays
Building cluster south of gap between bays
East building block (guard station, detention, supply depot)
South center building block (below large bay)
Large docking bay perimeter wall (circular, ~350px diameter centered at 750,550)
Small docking bay perimeter wall (circular, ~300px diameter centered at 1400,300)
Checkpoint structure and barricades near large bay approach

main-road.desc: Roads connecting districts and circling the docking bays -- patrolled

bay-large.desc: Large docking bay (left-center) -- circular pit with cross-hair markings, ship berth

bay-small.desc: Small docking bay (upper-right) -- circular pit, secondary berth

checkpoint.desc: Checkpoint blocking approach to the large docking bay (scanner, barricades, 2-4 guards)

building-streets.desc: Streets running through building clusters around the bays

impound.desc: Vehicle impound lot (seized speeders, possibility of stealing one)

patrol.desc: Stormtrooper patrol route (regular patrols, timing-based evasion around bays)

cover.desc: Positions offering partial cover near the docking bays
